title: Looking for JG Tutor YouTube is terrible
body: Hey just looking for a decent jungler to teach me how to jungle in your spare time. Thanks ;D

replies.body: Hey bro! If you're serious about getting some help, I would be happy to help. I'd be able to spectate some games and maybe even give commentary. Just hit me up in game and we can give it a go! (All for free of course, it'll benefit us both)

Hi there, If youtube isnt your thing, There are many jungle mains on Twitch.tv that also teach. I would reccomend Nightblue3 as he has been an NA challenger tier jungle main for years and offers tips and advice on playstyle, matchups, builds and strats.

Can't go wrong with maokai or naut, plenty of lockdown cc (naut better for that) the jungle is something like get 1st camp (krug or gromp), buff, if you have more than 3/5 hp do another camp (wolves) then next buff, back, get your smite, then either get losing lanes ahead, of get already winning lanes to just snow ball out of control with ganks, and if its people like riven/zed who if they do bad early usually rage quit, just harass them till they flip and tilt, or leave. and if its a tf mid, just sit on his lane and laugh, he cant gank other lanes, he has trouble avoiding ganks if he doesn't have gold card in 1st 1-2 sec of your gank(get on him before he gold you or laner he has trouble (especially lockdown ganks)), and he cant ham the laner easily, so he will usually just end u giving kills without getting any.

How is youtube bad for it?

What youtubers are you watching that are bad for explaining jungling?
